Use the skill-creator skill to refine an existing skill based on given resources or user input.

1. Identify the skill to refine: [skill name]
2. Review the provided resources or user input: [describe resources or input]
3. Follow the skill-creator process for editing existing skills:
   - Analyze how the resources or input can improve the skill
   - Update SKILL.md with refined instructions, workflows, or references
   - Add or modify bundled resources (scripts, references, assets) as needed
   - Ensure the skill follows progressive disclosure and core principles
4. Test the refined skill to validate improvements
